snippet.title: Legends of Astravia - Gameplay Teaser (2024)
snippet.description:
A new demo is coming this summer -- Wishlist on Steam now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1233680/Legends_of_Astravia/ 

Turnless battles, twisting dungeons, and countless secrets await you in the magical world of Astravia. As the wandering mystician Oliver, you and your companions must uncover the truth of your past... before the Cataclysm brings forth another age of ruin. 

Official Website: https://www.studioalemni.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AstraviaGame

#jrpg #indiegames #rpg
